services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We provide comprehensive solutions in the defense sector

items.title: RF Systems
items.summary: Electromagnetic superiority in the field with broadband RF solutions.
items.description: BISAVUNMA's RF solutions operate in the 9 kHz – 8 / 18 / 40 GHz range, providing signal collection, analysis, and direction finding (DF) capabilities. This detects all electromagnetic activities from drone control frequencies to enemy communication signals. Advanced spectrum analysis, waterfall and wrapped spectrum visualizations enable rapid threat identification. Our RF systems provide critical advantages in border security, base areas, energy infrastructure, and VIP protection.

items.title: Radar Systems
items.description: Our radar systems provide full area surveillance against modern threats. AESA radars and rotating antenna solutions can detect a wide range of targets from small drones to aircraft. Multi-target tracking, IFF, and high-resolution mapping capabilities secure base areas, airports, and critical facilities.

items.title: Signal Intelligence (SIGINT)
items.summary: Enemy communication network tracking with broadband signal intelligence.
items.description: Our SIGINT solutions operate in the 9 kHz – 8 / 18 / 40 GHz range, providing broadband collection and analysis capacity. These systems analyze enemy command-control signals, locate sources with direction finding (DF), and perform AI-supported threat classification. Provides proactive superiority to security forces against hybrid threats.

items.title: Electro-Optical & Thermal
items.summary: Target identification in all weather conditions, day and night.
items.description: Our EO/IR systems provide continuous day-night surveillance with high-resolution cameras, thermal sensors, and laser rangefinders. Integrated with radar and RF systems for visual target identification, minimizing false alarm risk. Particularly effective in border security and critical facilities.

items.title: Jammer Systems
items.description: BISAVUNMA's jammer systems operate in the 9 kHz – 8 / 18 / 40 GHz frequency range. Neutralizes drone control signals, GNSS/GPS connections, and enemy communication networks. Fixed, mobile, and portable models available. Energy efficiency achieved through threat-focused active operation principle. Creates multi-layered Anti-Drone architecture with radar, RF, and EO/IR integration.

items.title: DJI Enterprise
items.description: DJI Enterprise solutions are developed for reconnaissance, search-rescue, border security, and critical infrastructure inspections. Provides advantages to security forces with thermal cameras, RTK satellite support, long flight times, and high payload capacity. Can be managed on a single screen with BISAVUNMA integration with radar and RF systems.

items.title: System Integration
items.summary: All systems unite in a single C2 software.
items.description: Radar, RF, SIGINT, EO/IR, jammer, and hard-kill systems are integrated through specially developed C2 command control software. Thus, radar detects, RF verifies, EO/IR identifies, jammer blocks, hard-kill neutralizes. The entire process is managed from a single screen, minimizing decision-making time.

items.title: Technical Support
items.description: BISAVUNMA provides 24/7 technical support to ensure systems always operate at peak performance. Our customers are always supported with software updates, maintenance planning, fault detection, rapid response, and operator training.

about.title: Field-Proven Reliable Solutions
about.description: BISAVUNMA enables organizations to achieve operational superiority with its expert staff and engineering competencies in defense technologies.

cta.title: Strengthen Your Defense Solutions
cta.description: Contact our expert team and get custom solutions for your needs.
